word_mean: 教条，信条：经正式宣布，阐述并作为真理而奉行的信念、见解或这样的体系

sentence.Network_en: The newspaper seeks to be independent of political dogma.
sentence.Network_cn: 这份报纸力求不受政治信条影响.

sentence.Network_en: Their political dogma has blinded them to the real needs of the country.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的政治信条让他们看不到国家真正的需要。

sentence.Network_en: It is precisely such ignorant people who take Marxism - Leninism as a religious dogma.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些将 马克思列宁主义 当宗教教条看待的人,就是这种蒙昧无知的人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 教字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 教堂〖 church〗 教条〖 dogma;creed;doctrine;tenet〗 教条主义〖 dogmatism〗.
就像是电影怒犯天条(Dogma)一样，在圣经里面因为是黑人而被忽略的第十三个门徒提到的，耶稣原来也是黑人，但是虽然是精神领 …
教义(Dogma)由宗教概念及宗教经验两部份组成，教义作为宗教三元素中的最基本，是宗教行为（教仪）的内在根据，也是宗教组织…
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... doggerel 歪诗，打油诗 dogma 教条，信条 dogmatism 教条主义，武断.

list.abs: 翻译词典... ... central dogma 中心法则 Religious dogma 宗教教义 scientific dogma 科学定理.
...念 (virtue ethic)，用理性教导，不仗宗教教条 (religious dogma)来约束，可认为世界各国的理想典范。
scientific data 科学资料scientific dogma 科学定理scientific empiricism 科学实证论
...信息从DNA→DNA的复制过程，这就是分子生物学的中心法则(central dogma)。
今天遗传学的「中心教条」（Central Dogma）是：「脱氧糖核酸上的遗传密码，转译到糖核酸甜苦（Ribonucleic Acid，RNA）上， …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: via late Latin from Greek dogma 'opinion', from dokein 'seem good, think'

entry.def: If you refer to a belief or a system of beliefs as a dogma, you disapprove of it because people are expected to accept that it is true, without questioning it.

example.ex: Their political dogma has blinded them to the real needs of the country...
example.tran: 他们的政治信条让他们看不到国家真正的需要。

example.ex: He stands for freeing the country from the grip of dogma.
example.tran: 他主张将国家从教条的控制下解放出来。

means.word_mean: 1. a religious doctrine that is proclaimed as true without proof
2. a doctrine or code of beliefs accepted as authoritative;

auth_sentence.content: Dogma is not a friend to faith or wisdom.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dogma is not a friend to faith or wisdom.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dogma is not a friend to faith or wisdom.

auth_sentence.content: I'm not alone in my abhorrence of dogma.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm not alone in my abhorrence of dogma.

auth_sentence.content: Questions rooted in dogma, I tend to ignore.

sentences.en: People are beginning to question the old dogmas.
sentences.cn: 人们开始质疑旧的信条。
